select i.homeStayMarkNum, i.homeStayNum, i.title, i.hostNum, i.hostName, i.addr1, i.addr2,j.photoName as homeStayPhoto from (select a.homeStayMarkNum, a.homeStayNum, a.title, a.hostNum, b.name as hostName, a.addr1, a.addr2 from (select m.homeStayMarkNum, m.userNum as customNum, m.homeStayNum, h.userNum as hostNum, h.title, h.addr1, h.addr2, h.content, h.approval, h.price, h.open from homeStayMark m left join homeStay h on m.homeStayNum=h.homeStayNum where m.loginNum=#{loginNum}) a join user b on a.hostNum = b.userNum) i left join homeStayPhoto j on i.homeStayNum = j.homeStayNum group by i.homeStayMarkNum order by homeStayMarkNum desc limit #{start},#{perPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homeStayMark (HomeStayNum, userNum, loginNum) VALUES (#{homeStayNum}, (SELECT userNum from homeStay WHERE homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum}), #{loginNum})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM homeStayMark WHERE homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum} AND loginNum=#{loginNum}
